Category.Name: Root
Category.ToolTip: FPD - Device Description File - for device configuration

Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Description of the camera and its sensor

StringReg.Name: DeviceGigEFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Version of camera GigE vision Firmware

Boolean.Name: DetectorHibernate
Boolean.Description: Control the power state of the Detector

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Features relating to acutal image acquisition, including triggering mode

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.Description: Number of frames to be acquired in MultiFrame acquisition mode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Start image capture using currently selected acquistion mode

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Features controlling the size of the transmitted image

Enumeration.Name: TestImageSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Test image to use as output

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Features related to GigE Vision specification

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.Description: Size of the payload in bytes. This is the total number of bytes sent in the payload. No packet headers included.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.Description: Specifies the major version of the GigE Vision specification supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.Description: Specifies the minor version of the GigE Vision specification supported by this device.

Boolean.Name: GevDeviceModeIsBigEndian
Boolean.Description: Endianess of Bootstrap registers (FALSE: Little-endian device, TRUE: Big-endian device)

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Enumeration.Description: Describes the character set of all boot strap strings.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Integer.Description: Index to the network interface to configure

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: 48-bit MAC address of the selected interface
Integer.Description: 48-bit MAC address of the selected interface

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if LLA mode is supported
Boolean.Description: Indicates if LLA (Auto-IP) is supported by the selected interface.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.Description: Indicates if DHCP is supported by the selected interface.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if Persistent IP is supported
Boolean.Description: Indicates if Persistent IP is supported by the selected interface.

Enumeration.Name: GevCurrentIPConfiguration
Enumeration.Description: Current camera IP configuration of the selected interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: IP address of the selected interface
Integer.Description: IP address of the selected interface

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Subnet mask of the selected interface
Integer.Description: Subnet mask of the selected interface

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Default gateway of the selected interface
Integer.Description: Default gateway of the selected interface

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Persistent IP address for the selected interface
Integer.Description: Persistent IP address for the selected interface

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Persistent subnet mask for the selected interface
Integer.Description: Persistent subnet mask for the selected interface

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Persistent default gateway for the selected interface
Integer.Description: Persistent default gateway for the selected interface

StringReg.Name: GevFirstURL
StringReg.ToolTip: First URL to XML device description file
StringReg.Description: NULL-terminated string providing the first URL to the XML device description file.

StringReg.Name: GevSecondURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Second URL to the XML device description file
StringReg.Description: NULL-terminated string providing the second URL to the XML device description file.

Integer.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Integer.ToolTip: Number of device physical network interfaces
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces on this device.

Integer.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsUserDefinedName
Boolean.Description: Indicates if the User-defined Name register is supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsSerialNumber
Boolean.Description: Indicates if the Serial Number register is supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsEVENTDATA
Boolean.Description: Indicates if EVENTDATA_CMD and EVENTDATA_ACK are supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsEVENT
Boolean.Description: Indicates if EVENT_CMD and EVENT_ACK are supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsWRITEMEM
Boolean.Description: Indicates if WRITEMEM_CMD and WRITEMEM_ACK are supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsConcatenation
Boolean.ToolTip: Multiple operations in a single message support
Boolean.Description: Indicates if multiple operations in a single message are supported.

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.Description: Current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.Description: 64-bit value indicating the number of timestamp clock ticks in 1 second.

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatch
Command.Description: Latches the current timestamp value of the device.

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlReset
Command.Description: Resets the timestamp count of the device.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.Description: 64-bit value of the timestamp. Value must first be latched using GevTimestampControlLatch.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.Description: Indicate which stream channel to configure.

Integer.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Integer.Description: Index of network interface.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.Description: The size of the stream packet to send on this channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.Description: Delay (in 1µs) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Flag to indicate if features are locked during acquisition
